s1.ptxt: Relieve fuel pressure according to Fuel Pressure Relief Procedure .
Disconnect negative cable at battery.
Drain engine oil referring to Engine Oil and Filter Change .
Drain coolant referring to Cooling System Draining .
Disconnect breather hose (1) from air intake pipe (2).
Remove air intake pipe (2).
Disconnect MAF sensor connector (1).
Remove air cleaner case (2).
Disconnect radiator inlet hose (1).
Remove P/S pump belt referring to P/S Pump and A/C Compressor (If Equipped) Drive Belt Removal and Installation for M16 Engine Model .
Disconnect the following electric wires:

item.ptxt: Magnet clutch switch of A/C compressor (15) (if equipped)

s1.ptxt: Disconnect the following hoses:

item.ptxt: Brake booster hose (22) from intake manifold
Radiator inlet and outlet hoses (26) from each pipe
Heater inlet and outlet hoses (23) from each pipe
EVAP canister purge (25) hose from purge valve
Clutch oil pipe from transmission housing

s1.ptxt: Remove shift control lever referring to Transmission Shift Control Lever Removal and Installation .
Remove exhaust No.1, No.2 and center pipes referring to Exhaust System Components .
Remove front and rear propeller shafts referring to Propeller Shaft Removal and Installation .
With hose connected, detach P/S pump from its bracket (if equipped) referring to P/S Pump Removal and Installation for M16 Engine Model .

attention2.ptxt: Suspend removed P/S pump at a place where no damage will be caused during removal and installation of engine assembly.

s1.ptxt: With hose connected, detach A/C compressor from its bracket (if equipped) referring to Compressor Assembly Removal and Installation for M16 Engine Model .

attention2.ptxt: Suspend removed A/C compressor at a place where no damage will be caused during removal and installation of engine assembly.

s1.ptxt: Support front suspension frame and engine rear mounting member using jack (2).
Carry out Step 1) to 12) of “Removal” under Front Suspension Frame, Stabilizer Bar and/or Bushings Removal and Installation in order to lower engine with front suspension frame.
Remove front suspension frame mounting bolt (1).
Remove engine rear mounting member bolt (1).
Before lowering engine with transmission and front suspension frame from engine compartment, recheck to make sure all hoses, electric wires and cables are disconnected from engine.
Lower engine with transmission and front suspension frame from engine compartment.

attention2.ptxt: Before lowering engine, in order to avoid damage to A/C compressor and P/S pump, make clearance by rising them.

s1.ptxt: Disconnect transmission from engine referring to Manual Transmission Assembly Dismounting and Remounting , if necessary.
Remove engine with engine front mounting bracket (1) from engine front mounting (2), if necessary.
Remove clutch cover and clutch disc referring to Clutch Cover, Clutch Disc and Flywheel Removal and Installation , if necessary.
Install clutch cover and clutch disc referring to Clutch Cover, Clutch Disc and Flywheel Removal and Installation , if necessary.
Install engine with engine front mounting bracket to engine front mounting.
For tightening torque, refer to Engine Mountings Components:For M16A Engine with VVT , if necessary.
Connect transmission to engine referring to Manual Transmission Assembly Dismounting and Remounting , if necessary.
Lift engine with transmission and front suspension frame into engine compartment with jack.

attention2.ptxt: Before lifting engine, in order to avoid damage to A/C compressor and P/S pump, make clearance by rising them.

s1.ptxt: Tighten engine rear mounting member bolt referring to Engine Mountings Components:For M16A Engine with VVT .
Carry out Step 5) to 19) of “Installation” under Front Suspension Frame, Stabilizer Bar and/or Bushings Removal and Installation in order to lift engine with front suspension frame.
Remove engine jack.
Install front and rear propeller shafts referring to Propeller Shaft Removal and Installation .
Install exhaust No.1, No.2 and center pipes referring to Exhaust System Components .
Install A/C compressor to its bracket (if equipped) referring to Compressor Assembly Removal and Installation for M16 Engine Model .
Install P/S pump to its bracket (if equipped) referring to P/S Pump Removal and Installation for M16 Engine Model .
Return disconnected hoses, cables and electric wires noting the followings.
Install P/S pump and A/C compressor (if equipped) drive belt referring to P/S Pump and A/C Compressor (If Equipped) Drive Belt Removal and Installation for M16 Engine Model .
Adjust P/S pump and A/C compressor (if equipped) drive belt tension referring to P/S Pump and A/C Compressor (If Equipped) Drive Belt Inspection and Adjustment for M16 Engine Model .
Install air cleaner case (2).
Connect MAF sensor connector (1).
Install air intake pipe (2).
Connect breather union (1) to air intake pipe (2).
Check all removed parts are back in place.
Refill cooling system with coolant referring to Cooling System Flush and Refill .
Refill engine with engine oil referring to Engine Oil and Filter Change .
Install engine hood after disconnecting windshield washer hose.
After installation, bleed air from clutch system.
Refer to Air Bleeding of Brake System for air bleeding procedure.
Connect negative cable at battery.
With engine OFF, turn ignition switch to ON position and check for fuel leakage.
Start engine and check coolant oil and exhaust gas leakage at each connection.
